info.title: Scissors-API
info.summary: Scissors API provides a suite of endpoints for managing short links, Including creating shortened URLs, retrieving link history, customizing URLs, and Generating QR codes

get.summary: Get User Info by User ID
get.description:
GET 
Link History
http://localhost:5000/api/history

Example Response

 {
    "_id": "66bf279e1500e140420618e1",
    "originalUrl": "https://nairametrics.com/2023/09/23/ranking-the-largest-bank-in-nigeria-based-on-total-assets-2023/",
    "shortUrl": "uGkC4H8Np",
    "clicks": 0,
    "createdAt": "2024-08-16T10:19:10.906Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-08-16T10:19:10.906Z",
    "__v": 0,
    "qrCode": "data:image/png;base64,"
  },

   GET 

   route to serve the QR code for a specific shortened URL

   http://localhost:5000/api/qr/uGkC4H8Np

   Example Response

   {
  "qrCode": "data:image/png;base64,"
}
